comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Looks like en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Adee NYT of January 11, 1916 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60E10FC3B5B1773... reports that he was nominated as President of the U.S. National Lawn Tennis Association. NYT of February 12, 1916 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20915FF345C1373... indicates that he was president by then.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your research swanq. We'll add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
